TEXT.S: Dhimitër Orgocka mhtuw squ kawas te 1936, kinhulan nya ga Colca na Albania, mtzyuaw squ hayyo na ega' ru pgeki' ru pcbaq trang p'ega' uzi, ru wal pgluw squ pzyang balay hopa' lalu' na People's Artist beh Albania qaniy. masuq mqwas raygak lga t'aring pcbaq pgeki' kya squ san pgeki' kya Colca la, ru ki'a wal hmenas min kbhul msyaw kinbalay nya' geki' kya la. qyanux nya 1963 kawas htgan na ryax maki Korçë. tmasot mqwas biru University of Tirana. aring kekong Dhorkë Orgocka pinsqunan si tehok soni.
